Sept. 29, 1990 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Invitation Entertainment)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Invitation Entertainment) 0 Entertainments Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £225 and trophy, 2nd £115 and trophy, 3rd £75. 4 bands competed.
Nov. 14, 2014, 11:49 a.m. March 29, 2017, 12:27 p.m.
1 Rhodian Brass Murray Slater
2 Ransome Band Don Blakeson
3 Newstead Brass Duncan Beckley
4 Sir Richard Arkwright's Masson Mills Band Unknown
